original_text:
Country Farming
La fattoria di Country Farming vi aspetta per regalarvi Wild, Scatter, tanti giri gratis e un uovo d’oro che potrà farvi vincere uno dei sensazionali jackpot!
Tema e grafica
Il lavoro della fattoria è faticoso, a meno che non si possegga una gallina in grado di sfornare uova d’oro come quelle di Country Farming, bella slot targata Pragmatic Play. Gameplay semplice ma allo stesso tempo coinvolgente è uno dei punti di forza del gioco, senza dimenticare la grafica, altro elemento di primaria importanza per questo provider.
Lo stile del gioco è quello dei cartoon, i simboli sono disegnati in modo egregio, tanto che potrebbero benissimo far parte di un film di animazione della Disney. Le animazioni sono brevi e di grande effetto, non rubano la scena al gioco ma offrono dinamicità, spezzando il flusso di giocate e facendoci rifiatare. La griglia di gioco è sistemata su una parete di legno, i rulli hanno una trama scura che risalta bene con i colori accesi dei simboli. Sulla sinistra c’è uno spaventapasseri con un cartello appeso al collo su cui è scritto: Acquista Giri Gratis.
Un musica Country accompagna gli Spin, ma di tanto in tanto si intromette il belato di una pecora o lo starnazzare di un’oca.
Com’è fatta Country Farming
Facciamo ora una panoramica sulle caratteristiche generali del gioco, partendo dalla griglia di forma tradizionale, quindi con 5 rulli e 3 righe. Le linee di pagamento sono 20 e fisse e la scommessa minima per Spin costa appena 0,20 €.
La vincita massima è di 10.000 volte la scommessa e per provare a raggiungerla è necessario creare combo di almeno 3 simboli partendo dal primo rullo a sinistra e procedendo verso destra.
Ci sono vari modi per accelerare la caduta dei simboli: Giro Veloce, Giro Turbo e Autoplay. I primi due fanno ruotare i rulli a velocità molto più alte del normale, l’ultimo invece permette di impostare dei giri automatici, minimo 10 e massimo 1.000.
La volatilità è alta, il ritorno teorico al giocatore (RTP) è invece pari al 96,07%.
Come vincere a Country Farming
Ci sono diverse tipologie di simboli. I prodotti della terra come carota, pannocchia, e zucca sono quelli dal valore più basso, anche se alcuni ricompensano con una somma sino a 3 volte più alta della scommessa. Lo struzzo, l’oca, la gallina, il maiale, la pecora e la mucca invece sono simboli molto più generosi visto che arrivano a pagare sino a 50 volte la nostra puntata.
Il cane è il Wild pagante, quindi non solo completa le combo sostituendo tutti i simboli eccetto lo Scatter, ma quando ne atterrano 3, 4 o 5, pagano sino a 100 volte la puntata.
Il fattore è lo Scatter. Può cadere solo sui rulli 2, 3 e 4 e e regala 10 Free Spins. Come il Wild, anch’esso è pagante e ci ricompensa con il costo della puntata.
Il pacco è un simbolo misterioso: quando atterra si trasforma in uno dei simboli paganti e va a completare o a creare una serie vincente.
Se durante il gioco base arrivano da 5 a 9 uova d’oro, si vince il Jackpot associato. L’uovo d’oro che atterra durante la funzione Giri Gratis ha sia la funzione di Jackpot, sia quella di Wild.

Domande Frequenti 
Posso giocare anche su smartphone?

Sì, questo gioco funziona su qualsiasi dispositivo, fisso e mobile.



Dove posso giocare a Country Farming?

Sul nostro sito è presente una lunga lista di casinò legali che offrono questo gioco.



Come posso ottenere i giri gratis?

Si possono ottenere attraverso l’arrivo di 3 Scatter o acquistarli al costo di 100 volte la puntata.

raw_translation.response:
Step into the world of farming with the "Country Farming" slot game, brought to you by Pragmatic Play. With Wilds, Scatters, plenty of free spins, and a chance to win one of the sensational jackpots by landing the golden egg, this game is sure to thrill experienced gamblers.

The game's charming cartoon style graphics are top-notch, with symbols that could easily belong in a Disney animated movie. Short and dynamic animations add to the excitement without detracting from the gameplay.

The game features a traditional 5-reel, 3-row grid with 20 fixed paylines and a minimum bet of only €0.20 per spin. The maximum win is an impressive 10,000x the bet amount, and winning combinations must be formed from left to right starting with the leftmost reel.

The high volatility is balanced by a respectable 96.07% return to player (RTP) rate. To speed up gameplay, "Fast Spin," "Turbo Spin," and "Autoplay" options are available.

Symbols include farm produce such as carrots, corn, and pumpkins, as well as animals such as ostriches, chickens, pigs, sheep, and cows. The dog is the paying Wild symbol, replacing all others except the Scatter and paying up to 100x the bet. The Scatter, shown as the farmer's cap, lands only on reels 2-4, and rewards 10 free spins when 3 or more are landed.

The mystery package symbol transforms into one of the paying symbols when it lands, completing or creating a winning combination. With the arrival of 5-9 golden eggs during the base game, players can win the associated jackpot. Additionally, the golden egg that lands during the free spins feature serves as both a Wild and a jackpot opportunity.

"Country Farming" is available on both desktop and mobile devices. Free spins can be obtained by landing 3 Scatters or by purchasing them for 100x the bet. Play now at any legal online casino offering this exciting game on our website.

raw_translation.response:
Country Farming

Experience the excitement of Country Farming, a Pragmatic Play slot game that offers Wilds, Scatters, free spins, and the chance to win one of the sensational jackpots! The farm life may be hard work, but with an egg that could lead to big wins, it's worth the effort. The game features cartoon-style graphics with impeccably drawn symbols reminiscent of a Disney film. The animations provide a dynamic and engaging experience without detracting from the gameplay. The grid is on a wooden wall, and the reels contrast nicely against the bright colors of the symbols. 

With 20 fixed paylines and a minimum bet of just €0.20, players could win up to 10,000 times their bet. To win, simply create a combo of at least three symbols starting from the leftmost reel and going right. There are several ways to speed up the game, including Quick Spin, Turbo Spin, and Autoplay. Quick Spin and Turbo Spin increase the speed of the reels, while Autoplay allows players to set up to 1,000 automatic spins.

The game features a high volatility and a theoretical RTP of 96.07%, making it an excellent choice for experienced gamblers. The symbols include farm products such as carrots, corn, and pumpkins, as well as more generous ones like ostriches, geese, chickens, pigs, sheep, and cows. The dog is the paying Wild symbol, and when three or more land on the reels, they pay up to 100 times the bet. The scatter symbol is the pack, which can only land on reels two, three, and four and pays out ten free spins. Additionally, the golden egg that appears during free spins functions as both a jackpot and wild symbol.

Frequently Asked Questions:

Can I play on my smartphone?
Yes, this game can be played on any device, including desktop and mobile.

Where can I play Country Farming?
Our website features a long list of legal casinos that offer this game.

How can I get free spins?
Players can receive 10 free spins by landing three scatter symbols or purchasing them at a cost of 100 times the bet.

review_with_topics.prompt:
Below is a review for the slot game "Country Farming".

Please, rewrite the review in a neutral tone of voice. Write subsections covering only the following topics:

Gameplay and Features

Review: Country Farming

Experience the excitement of Country Farming, a Pragmatic Play slot game that offers Wilds, Scatters, free spins, and the chance to win one of the sensational jackpots! The farm life may be hard work, but with an egg that could lead to big wins, it's worth the effort. The game features cartoon-style graphics with impeccably drawn symbols reminiscent of a Disney film. The animations provide a dynamic and engaging experience without detracting from the gameplay. The grid is on a wooden wall, and the reels contrast nicely against the bright colors of the symbols. 

With 20 fixed paylines and a minimum bet of just €0.20, players could win up to 10,000 times their bet. To win, simply create a combo of at least three symbols starting from the leftmost reel and going right. There are several ways to speed up the game, including Quick Spin, Turbo Spin, and Autoplay. Quick Spin and Turbo Spin increase the speed of the reels, while Autoplay allows players to set up to 1,000 automatic spins.

The game features a high volatility and a theoretical RTP of 96.07%, making it an excellent choice for experienced gamblers. The symbols include farm products such as carrots, corn, and pumpkins, as well as more generous ones like ostriches, geese, chickens, pigs, sheep, and cows. The dog is the paying Wild symbol, and when three or more land on the reels, they pay up to 100 times the bet. The scatter symbol is the pack, which can only land on reels two, three, and four and pays out ten free spins. Additionally, the golden egg that appears during free spins functions as both a jackpot and wild symbol.

Frequently Asked Questions:

Can I play on my smartphone?
Yes, this game can be played on any device, including desktop and mobile.

Where can I play Country Farming?
Our website features a long list of legal casinos that offer this game.

How can I get free spins?
Players can receive 10 free spins by landing three scatter symbols or purchasing them at a cost of 100 times the bet.

response.headline: GAMEPLAY
response.content:
Get your farm boots ready and your tractors rolling because Country Farming is here! This vibrant and engaging slot game offers a classic feeling with 20 fixed paylines and a minimum bet of €0.20. But what's even better than farming without getting any dirt under your nails? Farming with Quick Spin, Turbo Spin, and Autoplay! Who knew farming could be so fast-paced?

Winning is easy - just form a combo of at least three symbols starting from the leftmost reel and going right. It's like a tasty harvest - the more you reap, the bigger your reward. Who needs a green thumb when you can have a lucky thumb?

With a game as fun as Country Farming, we can't help but wonder - who thought farm life was boring? From planting seeds to milking cows, Country Farming proves there's nothing dull about the rural life. So, take a break from the city and dive headfirst into the world of hay bales and big wins!

response.headline: Graphics and Design
response.content:
Prepare to be charmed by the delightful graphics of Country Farming! As you spin the reels, you'll be immersed in a cartoon world that looks like it could belong in a Disney film. The cute and colorful symbols are impeccably drawn, making each spin a visual treat for the eyes.

The developers have done an excellent job capturing the essence of farm life with the wooden wall background and the contrast of the bright colors of the reels. The design is not only visually pleasing but creates a calming atmosphere, making it the perfect slot to play when you need a break from the stresses of everyday life. Each symbol and detail has been carefully thought out, and it shows in the final product.

If you're a fan of farms, barns, and adorable animals, then this slot game is right up your alley. The developers have done such an excellent job that even non-farm enthusiasts will find themselves enjoying the theme. Sparkling green fields and rustic red barns will transport you to a simpler time and place where the only concerns are growing crops and raising livestock.

The game's graphics are not only pleasing to the eyes, but they also provide a comedic element that enhances the overall experience. The silly-looking rooster and the wide-eyed sheep are sure to make you chuckle. You'll also appreciate the attention to detail in the game's animations, especially when the tractor takes off after a big win!

All in all, the graphics and design of Country Farming are top-notch. The developers have found a perfect balance between visual appeal and functionality. So come on down to the farm, grab your pitchfork, and have some fun with this fantastic slot game.

response.headline: Special Symbols and Features
response.content:
What's a good slot game without fantastic symbols and bonus features? Luckily, Country Farming delivers on both fronts without disappointment. First, let's talk about the Wild symbol: the dog. Now, we're not sure what breed the dog is, but we like to think it's a Jack Russel Terrier. Why? Because they're small, feisty, and love digging for treasures, just like in this game. And boy do they bring in the loot, paying up to 100 times the original bet when three or more land on the reels.

And let's not forget about the scatter symbol, the pack. We have to say, it's refreshing to see a farming game that's not all about chickens or cows. The pack can only make an appearance on reels two, three, and four, but don't let that fool you – it unlocks ten free spins for the lucky player who lands it. Talk about a bonus! It's obvious that the developers behind Country Farming are paying attention to details, keeping things interesting with unique symbols for an online slots game.

We saved the best for last – the golden egg. It's not just any old Easter egg; during free spins, it serves as both the jackpot and wild symbol. We can't help but chuckle at the thought of the golden egg being so valuable. All those wise sayings from our parents about not putting all our eggs in one basket? Well, it seems they were wrong! Just keep an eye out for the egg as it appears on the reels, and you could be raking in some serious cash.

Review: Country Farming

Experience the excitement of Country Farming, a Pragmatic Play slot game that offers Wilds, Scatters, free spins, and the chance to win one of the sensational jackpots! The farm life may be hard work, but with an egg that could lead to big wins, it's worth the effort. The game features cartoon-style graphics with impeccably drawn symbols reminiscent of a Disney film. The animations provide a dynamic and engaging experience without detracting from the gameplay. The grid is on a wooden wall, and the reels contrast nicely against the bright colors of the symbols. 

With 20 fixed paylines and a minimum bet of just €0.20, players could win up to 10,000 times their bet. To win, simply create a combo of at least three symbols starting from the leftmost reel and going right. There are several ways to speed up the game, including Quick Spin, Turbo Spin, and Autoplay. Quick Spin and Turbo Spin increase the speed of the reels, while Autoplay allows players to set up to 1,000 automatic spins.

The game features a high volatility and a theoretical RTP of 96.07%, making it an excellent choice for experienced gamblers. The symbols include farm products such as carrots, corn, and pumpkins, as well as more generous ones like ostriches, geese, chickens, pigs, sheep, and cows. The dog is the paying Wild symbol, and when three or more land on the reels, they pay up to 100 times the bet. The scatter symbol is the pack, which can only land on reels two, three, and four and pays out ten free spins. Additionally, the golden egg that appears during free spins functions as both a jackpot and wild symbol.

Can I play on my smartphone?
Yes, this game can be played on any device, including desktop and mobile.

Where can I play Country Farming?
Our website features a long list of legal casinos that offer this game.

How can I get free spins?
Players can receive 10 free spins by landing three scatter symbols or purchasing them at a cost of 100 times the bet.
